title: Washington Square - characterization of the doctor

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how James uses literary elements and techniques to convey a complex characterization of the doctor.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how James uses literary elements and techniques to convey a complex characterization of the doctor.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
